Description.Text: No swimming pool. Small hotel suit for the budgeted travels, who like to explore and know more China culture and tourist attraction.

Check Inn Chinatown is located in the heart of Bangkok's Chinatown district. It is the main business area for textile, gifts, souvenirs and gold markets. The location also situates you close to the Chaophraya River, making it easy to access the historical tourist section of the city and also visit the Grand Palace, Wat Arun and the world famous Golden Buddha.
The building constructed with concrete and glass in a modern style.

You can chill and enjoy the Calm Roof Top Atmosphere at Check Inn Chinatown Roof Top Lounge. Here you can get away from the hustle and bustle of the streets of Chinatown and enjoy a nice relaxing evening accompanied by smooth Jazz and Bossa Music. The streets are also filled with restaurants and stalls that will allow you to eat till you drop. The food stalls are conveniently opened 24 hours a day.
The lobby is small size with air conditioning and seating area.
